app_name: Groups Control Groups Voice Recording and Karaoke Apps Recorder Plus Audio Editor
app_description: After nearly ten years of improvement Recorder Plus has evolved into a simple easy to use and powerful recorder download now for FREE! Record There is no limitation on recording time length and times. You can record as long as you want and as many times as you want. It s only up to the storage and battery power of your iPhone iPad. And you can add markers when recording. Edit: In App purchase Cut Copy Paste even between different recordings. Undo Redo and you can get back original file easily. Add markers and notes for the markers. Import audio file from other apps or from Cloud drive. Security: Backup recordings automatically to your iCloud drive or Google Drive. So your recordings will be safe even if your iPhone iPad get lost. And you can set iCloud as preferred storage in the app so you can access all recordings on other devices iPhone iPad . Share: Share recordings by Email Messages other apps cloud drive iCloud drive Dropbox GoogleDrive OneDrive Box... . Also you can download recordings by USB cable or WiFi sync. Effect: Subscription needed Tempo Pitch Gain Noise reduction Background music Yes this app is not only a recorder but also a powerful audio editor. Audio synthesis: Text to speech support for 38 countries with 54 voices. Speech to text: Transcribe English speech to text. More information about subscription 5 year : 1.Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase 2.Subscription automatically renews unless auto renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. 3.Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto renewal may be turned off by going to the user s Account Settings after purchase Terms of use: http: recorderplus.com termsofuse.html
